Blackfang: Right.

He takes the pod with both hands and starts to drag it in the hallways 
and to the mad bay.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Blackfang: It's very damaged. So bad that I doubt it would have 
> >been 
> > okay if we had helped it out earlier. We need to repair it before 
> >it's 
> > out of there.
> > 
> "Oh I see, Take it up to the medical quarters I'll be there as soon 
> as I get some of my tools from the storage bay, I wasn't expacting 
to 
> be so busy on the first day" Kenzo replied and headed towards the 
> storage bay.
